item.description:
All are welcome to join us as we discuss
the probability of the US experiencing either a
MELT UP or MELT DOWN
Inflation or Deflation?


  • What do these two terms mean?
  • What causes Inflation or Deflation?
  • What will life be like if the US is besieged by either?
  • How can Americans protect their assets in times of Inflation or Deflation?
  • What the heck does the graph associated with this meetUp mean?!


We will be watching and discussing the widely disseminated Internet film MELT UP which outlines the probability of Inflation in the US.

We will also be discussing the counter view point of Deflation.

Please join us as we discuss these important economic terms and how the realities of monetary policy effect us.

Organic snacks will be provided.
ALL ARE WELCOME

group.name: FREEDOM IS FUNDAMENTAL Book Club and Discussion Group

item.name: FREE Film : Melt Up (with a discussion of a Melt Down)
